description:
Original anime by Silver Link commemorating their 10th anniversary.

Today's the opening day for the high school division of the racing kneeler exhibition! Ladies gather from across the nation, determined to win in the "kneeler race." Today's race is to introduce this season's contestants. No one will be pushing themselves to the limit just yet, but you can expect that at the competition. So begins the female racers' fight for first place!

(Source: Crunchyroll)

tags.name: Motorcycles
tags.description: Prominently features the use of motorcycles.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Cute Girls Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around female characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Cars
tags.description: Centers around the use of automotive vehicles.

tags.name: Twins
tags.description: Prominently features two or more siblings that were born at one birth.

tags.name: Coastal
tags.description: Story prominently takes place near the beach or around a coastal area/town. Setting is near the ocean.

tags.name: Achronological Order
tags.description: Chapters or episodes do not occur in chronological order.

tags.name: Love Triangle
tags.description: Centered around romantic feelings between more than two people. Includes all love polygons.

name.native: ブリドカット・セーラ・恵美

node.description:
__Current Residence:__ Saitama, Japan
__Doujin Circle:__ Atelier Tiv Artworks (アトリエティブアートワークス)

[Website](http://planova.net/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/tiv_) | [Tumblr](http://tivatelier.tumblr.com/) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/tiv_0225/)

__[Profile (Lantis)](https://www.lantis.jp/artist/Void_Chords/bio.html) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/RyoTakahashi111)__

__Ryo Takashi__, alternatively known as Void_Chords, is a Japanese composer, arranger, music producer, bassist and DJ. He also works with the doujin group FELT under the alias Maurits "ZEN" Cornelis.

__Agency:__ 81 Produce

__[Profile (81 Produce)](https://www.81produce.co.jp/dcms_plusdb/index.php/item?cell003=%E3%81%9F%E8%A1%8C&label=1&cell004=&name=%E7%94%B0%E4%B8%AD%E3%80%80%E3%81%82%E3%81%84%E3%81%BF&id=241) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/kanataimi/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kanataimi) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/kanataimi/) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCuNJGVAHVT_A6q5GSFpKjHg)__

__Non-anime roles:__
- Rei - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- Royal Fortune - Azur Lane (VG)

[Website](https://www.heart-company.co.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/Saito_S_HC)

Produces and directs music. Founder of Heart Company.

He is an art director and supervisor, who was a long time member of Bihou until 2007 when he went to head the background art department in Totonyan. He belongs to the anime production group Neko-Nanban-Tei together with director Watanabe Takashi and his wife Miyata Naomi.

__Hayato Kaneko__ is a Japanese producer, animation planner and representative director of Studio Silver Link. He was a former employee at Studio Frontline (which went bankrupt in 2011), where he established his own team, recruiting staffers while still being under Frontline, and turning independent as an own studio going with the name Studio Silver Link later on.

The Studio 'Silver Link' had it's first appearance as a subcontracting animation studio with the production of TV series [Tayutama](https://anilist.co/anime/5734/Tayutama-Kiss-on-My-Deity/).

__Hayato Kaneko__ is a Japanese producer, animation planner and representative director of Studio Silver Link. He was a former employee at Studio Frontline (which went bankrupt in 2011), where he established his own team, recruiting staffers while still being under Frontline, and turning independent as an own studio going with the name Studio Silver Link later on.

The Studio 'Silver Link' had it's first appearance as a subcontracting animation studio with the production of TV series [Tayutama](https://anilist.co/anime/5734/Tayutama-Kiss-on-My-Deity/).
__Kimura Kaori__ is a Japanese producer, who also provides production assistance to various works.
